reviews.review: guys she is the cutest and nicest professor ever, I took her for professional writing and really all I had to do was submit my work and got a 99%. It was online and class was supposed to happen 2 days a week but she only had it once so it was super easy
She really cares about her students. Just attend each lecture and participate and you will be fine.

name: ENGL393X
title: Technical Writing
description: Prerequisite: Must have fulfilled the Academic Writing (FSAW) requirement. Restriction: Must have earned a minimum of 60 credits. Focuses on the writing of technical papers and reports. Click here for more information on professional writing courses.
